video_description:
PhoneArena reviews the ViewSonic ViewPad 7. At the lower end of the Android tablet market is the ViewSonic ViewPad 7, a 7-inch tab with phone functionality, a front and rear camera and Froyo on board. Looks good so far, but does it deliver?...
For more details, check out our full review:
http://www.phonearena.com/reviews/Viewsonic-ViewPad-7-Review_id2613
title: ViewSonic ViewPad 7 Review
